title: How to tell my girlfriend that I'm joining the Marine Corps - Quora

response.answer_text: Dont do this: “I’m joining the Marines, will you marry me?” “I’m joining the Marines, will you wait for me?” “I’m joining the Marines, can we go do it so I have good memories to carry me through.” Do this: “I’m joining the Marines. See you around.” Maybe do this: “I’m joining the Marines. Tell that frickin’ Jody (insert name of male that’s always hanging around) I’ll be back in 3 months. I’ll kill him if he so much as looks in your direction.”

Tell her how much she means to you. Tell her you have to do this. Say you will do your very best to return to her. Tell her this will make you the beginning of a real man. If she cares for you, she will understand. Don’t lie about anything. Tell her you are doing this for duty, honor and country. Say that she plays an important part of that. And lastly, tell her you hope she understands. Say that if we are mean’t for one another, God will bring us together again.
